      Methods in main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.connection that throw ConnectionErrorException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Connection.close()
      Closes the connection stopping any further packets from being sent or received.
      Message MessageReader.readNextMessage()
      Attempts to take the next packet that comes into the connection and convert it to a message and return the converted message
      byte[] Connection.receiveNextPacket()
      Get the next packet of data sent to the connection from the end point.
      void MessageWriter.sendMessage(Message m)
      Sends a message to the end point of the connection
      void Connection.sendPacket(byte[] packet)
      Send a packet to the end point at the other end of the connection
      boolean MessageReader.willReadBlock()
      Checks whether there is a packet waiting for the reader in the wrapped connection
      boolean Connection.willReceiveBlock()
      Checks whether Connection.receiveNextPacket() will block, it does not guarantee that the call will not block
